name: Kingdom Come Rising (Demo)
description:
Kingdom Come Rising is an epic and humorous RPG inspired by classic JRPGs from the '80s and '90s. It follows 17 year old Yumi and his 12 year old brother Croz as they try to stop a war between the 2 leading nations of the world: Fujin and Cruweg. By themselves they don't have the strength to win, however after learning about the magic of Xel they embark on a journey to master Xel and end the war.

These are the Minimum Requirements:

  • CPU: Intel Celeron N4000 or Raspberry Pi 4
  • GPU: Intel UHD Graphics 600 or Broadcom VideoCore VI
  • RAM: 2GB, 4GB is highly recommended
  • Storage: 500MB of free space

This demo covers the opening Prologue chapter, giving some background information as well as the tutorial free of charge to players interested in this upcoming game.

Kingdom Come Rising is planned to release late 2022 or early 2023 for Linux, Windows, and Raspberry Pi.
